newsitem.title: UK: UK's Clarke says stg to have deflationary impact.
newsitem.headline: UK's Clarke says stg to have deflationary impact.

text.p: Chancellor of the Exchequer Kenneth Clarke said on Wednesday the pound's appreciation would have a deflationary effect on the economy.
"Sterling is going to have a big deflationary effect," he told BBC radio in an interview.
The pound has appreciated 14 percent on a trade weighted basis since August last year.
